original_text:
Hades Gigablox
La software house Yggdrasil nel corso degli anni si è imposta sul mercato delle slot machine grazie ai suoi prodotti innovativi, caratterizzati da gameplay particolari e da grafiche di altissimo livello. Anche per quanto riguarda Hades: Gigablox ci troviamo davanti a un gioco che fa onore al nome del provider, regalando un’esperienza ludica davvero strabiliante.
Partiamo dal tema: ci troviamo nientemeno che negli Inferi, il regno dei morti popolato da creature demoniache che prendono vita sui rulli grazie alla grafica progettata al computer con tecnologia 3D.
Le immagini in Hades: Gigablox sono bellissime, i toni oscuri e la colonna sonora a tema contribuiscono a far sentire il giocatore dentro un’avventura dark, mentre il gameplay innovativo e decisamente non banale rende il gioco appassionante, con ottime possibilità di vincita.
Ogni creatura è rappresentata nei minimi dettagli, con Ade che prende vita sulla destra della griglia, incorniciata a sua volta da colonne di anime dannate, inquietanti teschi e serpenti, e con le fiamme dell’inferno che incendiano la schermata dal basso.
Hades: Gigablox può essere giocato dal proprio computer ma è ottimizzato anche per qualsiasi tipo di dispositivo mobile e anche in versione Play for Fun, se ci si vuole divertire senza investire un solo centesimo e senza la necessità di alcuna registrazione.
Caratteristiche principali della slot machine
Già a una prima occhiata Hades: Gigablox si presenta come una slot machine un pochino anomala: anziché la classica griglia 5×3 ne troviamo una 6×6, ma c’è di più! L’innovativa meccanica Gigablox prevede che i simboli possano diventare giganti, coprendo interni blocchi, anche tutta la griglia.
Hades: Gigablox ha diverse opzioni di scommessa, che possono essere impostate scegliendo il valore del gettone, compreso tra 0,002 e 2 €. In base al valore assegnato al gettone si può ricavare il range totale di scommesse, da un minimo di 10 centesimi a giro fino a un massimo di 100 € se si assegna il valore più alto al gettone e si punta su tutte le 50 linee di pagamento.
Questa fantastica slot machine di casa Yggdrasil è caratterizzata da una volatilità media, che prevede quindi sia premi di basso valore abbastanza costanti, sia vincite più alte, per ottenere  le quali però bisognerà avere un pochino di pazienza.
Il ritorno teorico al giocatore (return to player o RTP) di Hades: Gigablox si attesta su un 96 % perfettamente nella media della maggior parte dei giochi di slot.
Il gioco può essere impostato anche in Autoplay, che permette di far girare da sé i rulli.
Simboli di Hades: Gigablox
Su Hades: Gigablox oltre ai simboli rappresentanti i quattro semi delle carte da gioco, che sono anche le icone con valore minore, abbiamo una carrellata di demoni e figure della mitologia greca legata al mondo dell’oltretomba, tra cui il Minotauro, le Arpie, il ciclope, li serpente, nonché il re degli Inferi Ade e Cerbero, il leggendario cane a tre teste.
Tra le funzioni speciali troviamo la possibilità di trasformare un certo numero di simboli regolari in icone Wild, che permetteranno di aumentare il numero delle combinazioni vincenti.

raw_translation.response:
Hades Gigablox by Yggdrasil is a slot game that truly lives up to the provider's name, with innovative gameplay and high-quality graphics. Set in the underworld, the dark tones and theme music make for an immersive and thrilling experience. The innovative Gigablox mechanic adds an extra layer of excitement, with symbols becoming giants that cover multiple blocks or even the entire grid. 

This six-by-six grid slot machine offers a range of betting options, with a coin value between 0.002€ and 2€ for a minimum bet of 10 cents and a maximum of 100€ on all 50 paylines. With a medium volatility, players can expect both low and high-value prizes, but the latter requires patience. The return to player (RTP) rate of 96% is on par with other slots games. 

The symbols include demonic creatures and figures from Greek mythology, such as Minotaurs, Harpies, Cyclops, and Cerberus. Even Ade himself appears on the grid, accompanied by the flames of hell and columns of condemned souls. Special features include the ability to transform regular symbols into Wild icons, increasing the chance of winning combinations. 

Hades Gigablox is available on computers and mobile devices, as well as in Play for Fun mode, allowing players to enjoy the game without risking any money. Experience the underworld like never before with this exciting and immersive slot game from Yggdrasil.

raw_translation.response:
Hades Gigablox
Over the years, Yggdrasil has established itself in the slot machine market thanks to its innovative products, characterized by unique gameplay and high-quality graphics. With Hades: Gigablox, we find ourselves in front of a game that honors the provider's name, offering an astonishing gaming experience.

Let's start with the theme: we are in the underworld, the realm of the dead populated by demonic creatures that come to life on the reels thanks to computer-designed 3D graphics. The images in Hades: Gigablox are beautiful, with dark tones and a themed soundtrack that make the player feel like they're in a dark adventure. The innovative and decidedly non-trivial gameplay makes the game exciting, with excellent winning possibilities.

Each creature is represented in detail, with Hades himself coming to life on the right side of the grid, framed by columns of damned souls, eerie skulls and snakes, and with the flames of hell igniting the screen from the bottom.

Hades: Gigablox can be played on your computer but is also optimized for any type of mobile device and also in Play for Fun version, if you want to have fun without investing a penny and without the need for any registration.

Main features of the slot machine
At first glance, Hades: Gigablox appears as a somewhat anomalous slot machine: instead of the classic 5x3 grid, we find a 6x6 one, but there's more! The innovative Gigablox mechanic provides that symbols can become giant, covering internal blocks, even the entire grid.

Hades: Gigablox has several betting options, which can be set by choosing the value of the token, between 0.002 and 2 €. Based on the value assigned to the token, you can derive the total range of bets, from a minimum of 10 cents per spin up to a maximum of 100 € if you assign the highest value to the token and bet on all 50 paylines.

This fantastic slot machine from Yggdrasil is characterized by medium volatility, which therefore provides both constant low-value prizes and higher winnings, for which however you will need a little patience.

The theoretical return to the player (return to player or RTP) of Hades: Gigablox is 96%, perfectly in line with most slot machine games.

The game can also be set in Autoplay, which allows the reels to spin on their own.

Symbols of Hades: Gigablox
In addition to symbols representing the four playing card suits, which are also the icons with the lowest value, Hades: Gigablox features a range of demons and figures from Greek mythology related to the underworld, including the Minotaur, Harpies, Cyclops, snakes, as well as the king of the underworld, Hades himself, and Cerberus, the legendary three-headed dog.

Among the special functions, we find the possibility of transforming a certain number of regular symbols into Wild icons, which will allow increasing the number of winning combinations.

Review: Hades Gigablox
Over the years, Yggdrasil has established itself in the slot machine market thanks to its innovative products, characterized by unique gameplay and high-quality graphics. With Hades: Gigablox, we find ourselves in front of a game that honors the provider's name, offering an astonishing gaming experience.

Let's start with the theme: we are in the underworld, the realm of the dead populated by demonic creatures that come to life on the reels thanks to computer-designed 3D graphics. The images in Hades: Gigablox are beautiful, with dark tones and a themed soundtrack that make the player feel like they're in a dark adventure. The innovative and decidedly non-trivial gameplay makes the game exciting, with excellent winning possibilities.

Each creature is represented in detail, with Hades himself coming to life on the right side of the grid, framed by columns of damned souls, eerie skulls and snakes, and with the flames of hell igniting the screen from the bottom.

Hades: Gigablox can be played on your computer but is also optimized for any type of mobile device and also in Play for Fun version, if you want to have fun without investing a penny and without the need for any registration.

Main features of the slot machine
At first glance, Hades: Gigablox appears as a somewhat anomalous slot machine: instead of the classic 5x3 grid, we find a 6x6 one, but there's more! The innovative Gigablox mechanic provides that symbols can become giant, covering internal blocks, even the entire grid.

Hades: Gigablox has several betting options, which can be set by choosing the value of the token, between 0.002 and 2 €. Based on the value assigned to the token, you can derive the total range of bets, from a minimum of 10 cents per spin up to a maximum of 100 € if you assign the highest value to the token and bet on all 50 paylines.

This fantastic slot machine from Yggdrasil is characterized by medium volatility, which therefore provides both constant low-value prizes and higher winnings, for which however you will need a little patience.

The theoretical return to the player (return to player or RTP) of Hades: Gigablox is 96%, perfectly in line with most slot machine games.

The game can also be set in Autoplay, which allows the reels to spin on their own.

Symbols of Hades: Gigablox
In addition to symbols representing the four playing card suits, which are also the icons with the lowest value, Hades: Gigablox features a range of demons and figures from Greek mythology related to the underworld, including the Minotaur, Harpies, Cyclops, snakes, as well as the king of the underworld, Hades himself, and Cerberus, the legendary three-headed dog.

Among the special functions, we find the possibility of transforming a certain number of regular symbols into Wild icons, which will allow increasing the number of winning combinations.

And with medium volatility and several betting options, you'll be able to play for hours without feeling like a tortured soul.

Plus, with Autoplay mode, you can maximize your time in hell without even having to lift a finger. Just sit back and watch as the flames of fortune engulf you.

faq.question: What is the theoretical return to player?
faq.answer: The theoretical return to player of Hades: Gigablox is 96%, in line with most slot machine games.

faq.question: What are the symbols of the game?
faq.answer: The game features symbols representing the four playing card suits with low value, and a range of demons and figures from Greek mythology, including the king of the underworld and Cerberus.

faq.question: What special function does the game have?
faq.answer: Players can transform regular symbols into Wild icons, which increase the number of winning combinations.

faq.question: Can the game be played for free?
faq.answer: Yes, Hades: Gigablox has a Play for Fun version that players can enjoy without investing any money or registering.

faq.role: You are an experienced writer in the field of online slot games.
faq.prompt:
Below is a review of the game "Hades Gigablox".

Please provide an FAQ:

- 8 questions
- Use simple language and provide practical takeaways.
- Respond with a JSON!
- Use the key "faq" and an array with the keys "question" and "answer". 

Review: Hades Gigablox
Over the years, Yggdrasil has established itself in the slot machine market thanks to its innovative products, characterized by unique gameplay and high-quality graphics. With Hades: Gigablox, we find ourselves in front of a game that honors the provider's name, offering an astonishing gaming experience.

Let's start with the theme: we are in the underworld, the realm of the dead populated by demonic creatures that come to life on the reels thanks to computer-designed 3D graphics. The images in Hades: Gigablox are beautiful, with dark tones and a themed soundtrack that make the player feel like they're in a dark adventure. The innovative and decidedly non-trivial gameplay makes the game exciting, with excellent winning possibilities.

Each creature is represented in detail, with Hades himself coming to life on the right side of the grid, framed by columns of damned souls, eerie skulls and snakes, and with the flames of hell igniting the screen from the bottom.

Hades: Gigablox can be played on your computer but is also optimized for any type of mobile device and also in Play for Fun version, if you want to have fun without investing a penny and without the need for any registration.

Main features of the slot machine
At first glance, Hades: Gigablox appears as a somewhat anomalous slot machine: instead of the classic 5x3 grid, we find a 6x6 one, but there's more! The innovative Gigablox mechanic provides that symbols can become giant, covering internal blocks, even the entire grid.

Hades: Gigablox has several betting options, which can be set by choosing the value of the token, between 0.002 and 2 €. Based on the value assigned to the token, you can derive the total range of bets, from a minimum of 10 cents per spin up to a maximum of 100 € if you assign the highest value to the token and bet on all 50 paylines.

This fantastic slot machine from Yggdrasil is characterized by medium volatility, which therefore provides both constant low-value prizes and higher winnings, for which however you will need a little patience.

The theoretical return to the player (return to player or RTP) of Hades: Gigablox is 96%, perfectly in line with most slot machine games.

The game can also be set in Autoplay, which allows the reels to spin on their own.

Symbols of Hades: Gigablox
In addition to symbols representing the four playing card suits, which are also the icons with the lowest value, Hades: Gigablox features a range of demons and figures from Greek mythology related to the underworld, including the Minotaur, Harpies, Cyclops, snakes, as well as the king of the underworld, Hades himself, and Cerberus, the legendary three-headed dog.

Among the special functions, we find the possibility of transforming a certain number of regular symbols into Wild icons, which will allow increasing the number of winning combinations.

dalle-prompt.response:
Prompt:

Create a feature image for Hades Gigablox fitting the game's theme and characters. The image should be in a cartoon style and feature a happy Maya warrior with glasses. The Maya warrior should be standing in front of the Hades Gigablox grid and surrounded by the game's demonic creatures, including the Minotaur, Harpies, Cyclops, snakes, and Cerberus. The background should be dark and fiery, representing the underworld. Use vibrant colors to make the image eye-catching and engaging to potential players.
